english: In their anger they forget all the partisan quarrels .
chinese: 愤怒之中，他们忘掉一切党派之争。

english: We were on the ever of a partisan senate inquisition .
chinese: 我们正处在有党派偏见的参院调查的前夕。

english: Eisenhower had no taste for many of the rituals of politics .
chinese: 艾森豪威尔对党派斗争中的许多作法不感兴趣。

english: The next step was to secure the administration against partisan attack .
chinese: 下一个步骤是防止政府受到党派性的攻击

english: He was reluctant to plunge into a bitter personal and partisan wrangle .
chinese: 他不愿卷入这种个人之间的和党派的激烈争论。
党派造句挺难的，這是一个万能造句的方法

english: There was no need to indulge in "the exaggerations of partisan political talk. "
chinese: ”不要多谈“夸大其词的党派斗争问题。”

english: There was a clearer distinction of ranks and a dimmer distinction of parties .
chinese: 等级壁垒还相当森严，而党派的壁垒却不太分明。

english: The united states could be pulled off course by electoral obsession and party passion in washington .
chinese: 华盛顿的大选热潮和党派斗争情绪有可能使美国脱离正道。

english: Her main fault was a brooding, eternal immitigable suspicion of all men, things, creeds and parties .
chinese: 她的主要错误是对一切人、事、信条与党派都抱郁郁沉思、一成不变、不能缓和的怀疑态度。

english: Have i been a briber of votes? --a buyer of boroughs? the agent of corruption for any purpose, or on behalf of any party ?
chinese: 我曾经贿选过吗？我曾经收买过市民吗？曾因任何目的或为任何党派而营私舞弊过吗？
